text:
James, Viscount Severn, born 17 December 2007) is younger child and only son child of Prince Edward, Earl of Wessex and Sophie, Countess of Wessex
He was born at Frimley Park Hospital in Frimley, Surrey, He is only son is two children of Prince Edward, Earl of Wessex, and Sophie, Countess of Wessex. He is youngest grandchild of Queen Elizabeth II and Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh. He is 12th in line of succession to the British throne.
Because he is the oldest son of an earl, he has the official title of "Lord Severn".

annotations.surface_form: line of succession to the British throne
